oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chute-side Entry of Lameness Information thru the Use of Touch-screen Technology
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shearer, J. K.
Irsik, M. B.
DeVries, A.
Shearer, L. C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: lameness
on-farm
computer
RFID
AABP Lameness Committee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The on-farm capture of lameness information remains a major deficiency in animal health record keeping programs throughout North America. To address this issue, a language-neutral record-keeping system was developed utilizing touch screen computer technology, RFID and the claw zone and foot numbering techniques as described by the AABP Lameness Committee in 2004.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2008; 284
